result.html: Bob nó biaTrick or treat!
result.ponchtml: Bob nó biaTrick or treat!

result.eng: Would you like a bite to eat?

result.eng: Did I give you enough food?

result.eng: We produce healthy food without too many additives.
result.ga: Táirgíonn muid bia sláintiúil gan barraíocht breiseán

result.eng: I eat every type of food.
result.html: Ithim chuile shórt biaI eat every type of food.
result.ponchtml: Iṫim ċuile ẛórt biaI eat every type of food.

result.html: Is breá liom bia IodálachI love Italian food!

result.eng: Do you eat all kinds of food?

result.eng: We depend on him for food all year round.
result.ga: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
